channel.title: Error with Special Attacks
channel.description:
Alright, Well I was messing around with special attacks and weapons, i compiled everything and it worked, now whenever i try to use a special attack on any weapon i get this server-sided error. :( Im pretty sure its something to do with CombatAssistant.java but Im not entirely sure cause i messed around with other files too.
[code] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1158 at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.activateSpecial(CombatAssistant.java:2962) at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackNpc(CombatAssistant.java:256) at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1641) at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:142) at server.Server.main(Server.java:183)[/code]

item.title: Error with Special Attacks
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

[quote=“MR Terror, post:7, topic:523802”][quote author=Damoiscool link=topic=642348.msg4326944#msg4326944 date=1373088263]
It is

if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] == null && c.playerIndex > 0) { return;
[/quote]
Delete that line and it will work.[/quote]

Thanks it did

Read full topic

item.title: Error with Special Attacks
item.dc:creator: @MR_Terror MR Terror
item.description:
@MR_Terror wrote:

[quote=“Damoiscool, post:3, topic:523802”]It is

if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] == null && c.playerIndex > 0) { return;[/quote]
Delete that line and it will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Error with Special Attacks
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

I dont know what the 1158 means but I messed around with stuff and managed to fix it to the point where it only throws that error when I’ve spawned the npc with a command.

[quote=“Oracle.com”]public class ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
extends IndexOutOfBoundsException
Thrown to indicate that an array has been accessed with an illegal index. The index is either negative or greater than or equal to the size of the array…[/quote]

Read full topic
